hero.title: We Build
hero.description: A small team of passionate developers creating cutting-edge mobile and web applications. We bring your ideas to life quickly and efficiently.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a comprehensive range of software development services to help your business thrive in the digital landscape.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Fast, beautiful Flutter apps for iOS and Android with seamless user experiences and native performance.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Modern web applications using React, Next.js, and Angular with responsive designs and optimized performance.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: User-centered design that creates intuitive, engaging, and accessible digital experiences.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Powerful backend solutions using Rust, Python, Go, and Node.js for high-performance applications.

cloud.title: Cloud Services
cloud.description: Cloud infrastructure setup and management on AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform.

database.title: Database Solutions
database.description: Scalable database architecture with SQL and NoSQL solutions optimized for performance.

analytics.title: Analytics & AI
analytics.description: Data analytics solutions and AI integration to drive business intelligence and automation.

rapid.title: Rapid Development
rapid.description: Agile processes and efficient workflows that deliver high-quality products in record time.

about.title: About
about.description1: We're a small team of passionate developers who do what we love — creating exceptional digital products with speed and precision. Our name 'DenkiLab' combines the Japanese word for electricity (Denki) with 'Lab' to represent our fast, energetic approach to development.
about.description2: Being a compact team allows us to move quickly, communicate effectively, and deliver results without the overhead of larger agencies. We specialize in Flutter for mobile, modern web frameworks, and powerful backend solutions.

portfolio.title: Our
portfolio.description: Explore our recent projects and see how we've helped businesses transform their digital presence.

blog.title: Our
blog.description: Insights and tutorials from our development team. We share what we're learning and building.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our clients have to say about working with us.

testimonials.content: ByteForge transformed our business with a custom e-commerce platform that increased our online sales by 200% in just six months.

contact.description: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how we can help bring your ideas to life.
